message:
So which other Take 2 forum members should we try to drag over here?

(Note:  I already sent anacreon an email a while back telling him to come and see what we're up to.)

Also, who is this “dennyabram” who joined us here?  He seems to have joined a whole bunch of Convore groups indiscriminately.

Can we make this invite-only, and if we can, SHOULD we?

I don't know about making it invite-only. We've always been fairly good at making the trolls and idiots feel uncomfortable enough to leave forever (except for a few notable exceptions, such as Badlander), and some new, interesting folks couldn't hurt. Hell, perhaps the fact that new, interesting folks weren't joining frequently enough had a little something to do with the forum dying in the first place.

As for invites, I'd nominate Dusty, Buffel, Hamsack and Reader (although it's unlikely he'll join).
Also nominated: that guy that one time who was looking for the Fight Club game. And the one who wanted to know if his PC would run "all the games".
I'd love to have any of the T2 crowd here really. I'd be ecstatic to have Buffel and Hamsack even out the PC numbers. ;/
Iori!!!
Let's kick Jevous....
Hahahaha!
Where is that Gray guy anyway? :P
Stalking me all over teh entertubes.
Have I cracked the nod for an invite?
Hm?
Who's that guy up there? :P
Mr_V or Neilan?
Nor me.
Oh, is that not really Iori?
Or are we just assuming ... ?
Not me

I suppose we can always test it...

Iori, do you want to play mafia with Darric?
It's probably not the real Iori, he'd be too busy playing LoL.
No its me, if that helps. And no, I do not want to play Mafia with Darric. One particularly sharp, and distrusting, dagger in my back is enough thanks. Fool me once, shame on you, and all that.
What if he wants to play with you?
No, but you will. ;)
Will he get killed immediately?
